reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Great professor, explains concepts clearly but is strict on deadlines.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: His lectures are interesting, but the exams are quite tough.

reviews.subject: Calculus II
reviews.review: Engaging professor! Makes complicated material easy to understand.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: The lectures can be a bit dry, but he's very helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: Molecular Biology
reviews.review: Very patient and approachable. You learn a lot in her class.

reviews.subject: Economics 101
reviews.review: Too focused on his research and not enough on teaching.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: She gives lots of homework but it helps you understand the material better.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Very engaging lectures and easy to follow, but grading is harsh.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Sociology
reviews.review: Fantastic professor! Always available to help outside of class.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 101
reviews.review: Interesting class, but the grading seems unfair at times.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Her lectures are very informative and she gives great feedback on assignments.

reviews.subject: Physics I
reviews.review: A bit disorganized but very knowledgeable in his field.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Enthusiastic and passionate about the subject. Enjoyed her class!

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Very monotone during lectures, makes it hard to stay focused.

reviews.subject: Human Anatomy
reviews.review: She really cares about her students and makes sure everyone understands the material.

reviews.subject: Civil Engineering
reviews.review: He covers too much material too quickly, making it hard to keep up.

reviews.subject: Pharmacology
reviews.review: Super helpful and very patient. Her class was challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Advanced Calculus
reviews.review: His lectures are informative, but his expectations are very high.

reviews.subject: American Government
reviews.review: Great professor, but sometimes hard to reach outside of class.

reviews.subject: Business Law
reviews.review: His exams are too difficult and don't reflect the material covered in class.
